infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Recipe-Share requires access to your camera to let you set a profile picture and upload pictures of recipes. Your images will not be shared with 3rd parties outside the Recipe-Share app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Recipe-Share requires access to your camera roll to let you set a profile picture and upload pictures of recipes. Your images will not be shared with 3rd parties outside the Recipe-Share app.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Recipe-Share requires access to your camera roll to let you set a profile picture and upload pictures of recipes. Your images will not be shared with 3rd parties outside the Recipe-Share app.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Recipe-Share requires speech recognition permission to easier allow you to input instructions when creating a recipe.
